where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (mct <* QUERY (sar <* USEDIN (SELF, 'FUNCTIONAL_ASSIGNMENT_TO_PART_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_SHAPE_ASPECT') | sar\shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'member connected terminal') | SIZEOF (['FUNCTIONAL_ASSIGNMENT_TO_PART_MIM.' + 'ASSEMBLY_MODULE_TERMINAL', 'FUNCTIONAL_ASSIGNMENT_TO_PART_MIM.' + 'BARE_DIE_TERMINAL', 'FUNCTIONAL_ASSIGNMENT_TO_PART_MIM.' + 'INTERCONNECT_MODULE_TERMINAL', 'FUNCTIONAL_ASSIGNMENT_TO_PART_MIM.' + 'PACKAGE_TERMINAL', 'FUNCTIONAL_ASSIGNMENT_TO_PART_MIM.' + 'PACKAGED_PART_TERMINAL'] * TYPEOF (mct.related_shape_aspect)) = 1)) >= 2

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(sar <* shape_aspect_relationship | (sar\shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'functional terminal allocation') AND NOT(('FUNCTIONAL_ASSIGNMENT_TO_PART_MIM.' + 'FUNCTIONAL_UNIT_TERMINAL_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF(sar.relating_shape_aspect)) AND (sar.relating_shape_aspect\shape_aspect.description = 'scalar terminal') ))) = 0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(sar <* shape_aspect_relationship | (sar\shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'functional terminal allocation') AND NOT(('FUNCTIONAL_ASSIGNMENT_TO_PART_MIM.' + 'ASSEMBLY_MODULE_TERMINAL' IN TYPEOF(sar.related_shape_aspect)) OR ('FUNCTIONAL_ASSIGNMENT_TO_PART_MIM.' + 'BARE_DIE_TERMINAL' IN TYPEOF(sar.related_shape_aspect)) OR ('FUNCTIONAL_ASSIGNMENT_TO_PART_MIM.' + 'INTERCONNECT_MODULE_TERMINAL' IN TYPEOF(sar.related_shape_aspect)) OR ('FUNCTIONAL_ASSIGNMENT_TO_PART_MIM.' + 'PACKAGED_PART_TERMINAL' IN TYPEOF(sar.related_shape_aspect)) ))) = 0

rule.name: functional_usage_view_to_part_terminal_assignment_unique_constraint
